attributes.additional_details: This petition will help young children victimised by bullying and will help offer more support.Not enough is done in schools to help children who are bullied which then leads to further problems in adulthood and extreme cases suicide.I want more done to help children in school and out, I also want higher levels of training for teachers on bullying. I also want bullies to see councillors and taught what their doing isn't right and taught how to go about situations with out being nasty or violent.
attributes.background: Bullying is a problem effecting so many young people across the world, however hardly any action is taken. People may disagree but from experience we are left isolated to deal with it alone. Schools don't want to recognise this problem.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. When the petitions site reopens after the General Election, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
